question: Do I have to be Burmese to join?
answer: Not at all! We welcome everyone who’s interested in Burmese culture or simply wants to make new friends. All nationalities are welcome!

question: Is there a minimum commitment to join the CCA?
answer: Nope! There’s no strict commitment required. Just come join our events whenever you can. That said, we highly encourage you to attend regularly — they’re lots of fun and a great way to connect with the community!

question: Do I get any CCA points or SEP points?
answer: Not yet. MCNUS isn’t an official CCA just yet, so we can’t offer points. But your participation helps us move closer to official recognition — and that’s something you can be proud to be part of!
